ejaculate.gloss: the thick white fluid containing spermatozoa that is ejaculated by the male genital tract

ejaculation.gloss: an abrupt emphatic exclamation expressing emotion

ejection.gloss: the act of expelling or projecting or ejecting
the act of forcing out someone or something

ejection seat.gloss: a pilot's seat in an airplane that can be forcibly ejected in the case of an emergency

ejector.gloss: a person who ousts or supplants someone else
a mechanism in a firearm that ejects the empty shell case after firing

ejector seat.gloss: a pilot's seat in an airplane that can be forcibly ejected in the case of an emergency

eject.gloss: put out or expel from a place
cause to come out in a squirt
